channel.title: Need help with Port Forwarding
channel.description:
I need help to Port Forward a D-Link router, I don't got the "gaming" button but I got "Visual Server"... I tried to Port Forward but it didn't work! I have looked on every Port Forward tut I can find.. none of them works...
If you help me and get it working you will be rewarded with Co-Owner in my server...[br][size=1]Posted on: April 09, 2007, 04:17:54 AM[/size][hr]Is anyone going to answer this?

item.title: Need help with Port Forwarding
item.dc:creator: @texis11 texis11
item.description:
@texis11 wrote:

Well… I asked how to Port Forward the router, not how to get my computer IP address[br][size=1]Posted on: April 09, 2007, 11:17:11 AM[/size][hr]Oh, jeeze, can someone please help me? I have played the server with Hamatchi long enought now, and now when my Hamatchi screwed up I really need help with Port Forwarding for a No-Ip

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with Port Forwarding
item.dc:creator: @Zzz_O_zzZ Zzz O zzZ
item.description:
@Zzz_O_zzZ wrote:

I also have D-Link router. I have portfowarded with this also.

Make sure your using your “default gateway” i.p. and also make sure that in firewall the “don’t allow exceptions” checkmark is gone.

And When Your Accessing Your Server, Make Sure Your Telling Them The I.P. That Comes Up When You Go To This Link. http://www.findmyip.com/

Read full topic
